item.title: The next big LHC upgrade? Software.
item.description:
Symmetry magazine ran a nice article on the DIANA/HEP project.

“The software we used to build the LHC and perform our analyses is 20 years old,” says Peter Elmer, a physicist at Princeton University. “Technology evolves, so we have to ask, does our software still make sense today? Will …
item.dc:creator: Kyle Cranmer

item.title: Announcing DIANA
item.description:
We are proud to announce that DIANA/HEP has been funded by the National Science Foundation's Software Infrastructure for Sustained Innovation (SI2) program. We are just kicking off the project, and will be updating these web pages and adding posts as we go along.

We have created DIANA-HEP GitHub Organization …
item.dc:creator: Kyle Cranmer
